name: nmcvfval

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(c2nd, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cnmcv, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(2nd ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(normCV ` c1)
⊣ (normCV ` c1)=(2nd ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(c2nd, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cnmcv, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(2nd ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(normCV ` c1)
⊣ (normCV ` c1)=(2nd ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cnmcv, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))
-| wceq(cnmcv, c2nd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(c2nd, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c1))
-| wceq(cnmcv, c2nd)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(c2nd, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c1))

comment: Value of the norm function in a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
